Name: Storm Sash
LongDescription: Boosts the maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cyndaquil, Quilava, and Typhlosion.  You can get a Storm Sash at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Cynda-Hair, a Cynda-Claw, and a Blazing Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
